name: ES Intraday Mean Reversion Bollinger-RSI
description: Intraday mean-reverting strategy for E-mini S&P 500 (ES) futures using 20-period Bollinger Bands and 14-period RSI on 5-minute bars. Long when price closes below lower band & RSI<30; short when price closes above upper band & RSI>70. Positions sized at 2 % account risk via Fixed Fraction sizing. Stop loss at 1.5×ATR(14), take profit at 1×ATR(14) or earlier exit when price reverts to mid-band or RSI returns to neutral zone.
